name: Hakosan (HelloWorldRamen)
description:
Hakosan is a game about filling a box with tasty treats. A proper tutorial is under construction. Until then...

MATCH three or more of the same item to create a more valuable one.

TAKOYAKI balls roll around, getting in your way. Trap them to turn them into octopus sausages.

STORE items in the top left corner of the board for later use.

CHOPSTICKS can remove most items from the board, or turn takoyaki into sausages.

SOY SAUCE is a wildcard. If it cannot match anything, it will turn into an obstacle instead.

SUPER items can sometimes be created when you match more than three of an item. They are worth double the points!

GAME OVER when the board fills up completely. Can you make the legendary salmon rose?
